title: Will SSW Talon And Other Esports Skins Go On Sale When The SKT T1 Skins From Worlds S5 Get Released?
body: I really wanna get SSW Talon, will it go on sale when the SKT T1 skins from the season 5 world championships get released?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Historically, yes, previous esports skins make their way out of the vault. They also come back during various esports events!
Such as? Does the Mid-Season Invitational count? How early can i get the SSW Talon skin?
I'm not sure on the specifics. :c
